I back their call for assurances on jobs, agreements and pensions and urge the Mayor to work with RMT to get the funding TFL needs from this Tory Govt.

The Commons will sit late this evening debating the Lords amendments to the #PoliceBill. 

I'm backing those amendments which reject the government's restrictions on protest. 

This Bill is an attack on democracy and your right to speak out. We need to #KillTheBill.

Our Welsh Labour government is helping young people not just survive, but thrive - Social Justice Minister @JaneHutt writing in @LabourList 

https://t.co/V3apru86z2
Proud that our Welsh Labour Government will provide support for some of our most vulnerable young people, by piloting a basic income set at a real living wage.

Pleased to visit the excellent exhibition @cynonvalleymus marking LGBTQ+ month, recognising the contribution over centuries of individuals to the life of our country - from poetry to politics. 

We are our history and must be proud of it!

More at: https://t.co/2ZMzkcq2OW https://t.co/3ePFEqlIhr

A successful #WASPI (Women Against State Pension Injustice) stall in #Aberdare this weekend. 

We spoke to women affected by this pension injustice and hope to build a local campaign - contact my office to get involved.

Thanks to the Rhondda WASPI Women Group for their support. https://t.co/QK8IX5aj8P

Please join this tonight at 6pm at the Senedd in Cardiff if you can to show solidarity with the people of Ukraine.

This kind of hateful comment is appalling & dangerous. It is based on misinformation and is an attack on our freedom of speech. It does nothing to support the people of Ukraine or bring about peace.

Harri was diagnosed with Leukaemia in 2018 when he was 6 months old.

Last week, his parents were told that he has no further options available on the NHS and his last chance is to raise money for treatment abroad.

Donate or read about the campaign here: https://t.co/bWIwjgju3l https://t.co/762Vog3kWZ

Wales is setting an example by offering sanctuary and a warm welcome to those displaced by the conflict in Ukraine. UK government must act now. #NationOfSanctuary 
https://t.co/x8QWWrC9SY

My full support to those demonstrating throughout the world in support of the people of Ukraine and for peace and an end to Russian aggression. I stand with my comrade @MickAntoniw1 and all others protesting in London today. https://t.co/BeQCU18HoP

As they continue to sacrifice their wages whilst taking action to defend university staff pay and pensions, i'm giving my 100% backing to UCU members in @UCUWales and my former colleagues in @SwanseaUCU. 

#OneOfUsAllOfUs

There must be an immediate ceasefire and Putin must withdraw Russian troops.

We must ensure that humanitarian aid is provided and we offer refuge and welcome to those wishing to come to the UK.

My thoughts too are with those in the UK who have family and friends in the Ukraine.

Appalling scenes overnight as Russia continues its invasion of Ukraine.

Support and solidarity with the people of Ukraine and those in Russia who are bravely demonstrating in opposition to the war and calling for peace.

RT @antonioguterres: With the death toll rising, we are seeing images of fear, anguish and terror in every corner of Ukraine.

The protecti‚Ä¶

Putin's invasion of Ukraine today is horrifying and unjustifiable. 

Russian troops must be withdrawn immediately. The prevention of casualties must be our priority. 

A peaceful and diplomatically negotiated resolution of the crisis is necessary.

Developments in Ukraine are a dangerous escalation & a threat to civilian lives. Ukrainian sovereignty should be respected & Russian troops withdrawn. We need immediate de-escalation of tension, disarmament on the frontline & peaceful dialogue based on the Minsk II proposals.

People on legacy benefits got nothing.
